turns.text: Hello! My name is Sarah. What is your name?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Hi Sarah. My name is Tom.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Nice to meet you, Tom. Where are you from?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I am from Spain. And you?

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: I am from the UK. Welcome!

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Welcome so Starbucks. What would you like?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I would like a coffee, please.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Sure. Black or with milk?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: With milk and sugar, please.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Can I help you find anything?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Yes, I am looking for a blue shirt.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: What size do you need?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I need a medium, please.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Good morning. How can I help you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I'd like a return ticket to London, please.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Leaving today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Yes, on the next available train.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Could you give us an update on the marketing project?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Certainly. We have completed the initial research phase.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Excellent. Are we on track for the deadline?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Yes, we should finish by next Friday as planned.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: Some argue that AI will replace human creativity. What is your take?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I believe AI will augment creativity rather than replace it completely.

turns.speaker: app
turns.text: That is an optimistic view. But what about redundancy?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: New roles will emerge that require managing these advanced tools.
